title: Technical Guide for LiveID, Driving License and Passport Scan Support
description: This guide describes the procedures to enroll the user’s liveID (captures the live(real-time) facial images) details, driver’s license (DL), and passport details within the BlockID mobile application. While registering, users are first required to enroll in a new PIN and then enroll their biometrics. The biometric options include TouchID / FaceID, and LiveID. Once enrolled, the Identity Assurance Level (IAL) will be set to 1.
